Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Mondoo UI v2

Complete redesign of Mondoo security platform using:
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- Tailwind CSS 4
- Headless UI components
- Apollo Client for GraphQL
- TanStack Table for data tables

Features implemented:
- Authentication system \(Firebase\) with dev bypass mode
- Dashboard layouts \(main, space, organization\)
- Findings management \(CVEs, Advisories, Checks\)
- Asset inventory with detail pages
- Triage toolbar for bulk actions
- Exception management
- Command palette \(Cmd+K\)
- Responsive sidebar navigation

Routes:
- /dashboard - Main dashboard
- /space/[spaceId] - Space dashboard
- /space/[spaceId]/findings - Findings list
- /space/[spaceId]/findings/cve/[cveId] - CVE detail
- /space/[spaceId]/inventory - Assets and software
- /space/[spaceId]/inventory/asset/[assetId] - Asset detail
- /org/[orgId] - Organization dashboard

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
